card.name: Vraska the Unseen
card.text: +1: Until your next turn, whenever a creature deals combat damage to Vraska the Unseen, destroy that creature. −3: Destroy target nonland permanent. −7: Create three 1/1 black Assassin creature tokens with "Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, that player loses the game."

card.name: Wall of Stolen Identity
card.text: You may have Wall of Stolen Identity enter the battlefield as a copy of any creature on the battlefield, except it's a wall in addition to its other types and it has defender. When you do, tap the copied creature and it doesn't untap during its controller's untap step for as long as you control Wall of Stolen Identity.

card.name: Warstorm Surge
card.text: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, it deals damage equal to its power to any target.

card.name: Wayfaring Temple
card.text: Wayfaring Temple's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creatures you control. Whenever Wayfaring Temple deals combat damage to a player, populate. (Create a token that's a copy of a creature token you control.)

card.name: Wildfire Devils
card.text: When Wildfire Devils enters the battlefield and at the beginning of your upkeep, choose a player at random. That player exiles an instant or sorcery card from their graveyard. Copy that card. You may cast the copy without paying its mana cost.

card.name: Willbender
card.text: Morph {1}{U} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.) When Willbender is turned face up, change the target of target spell or ability with a single target.

card.name: Wind-Scarred Crag
card.text: Wind-Scarred Crag enters the battlefield tapped. When Wind-Scarred Crag enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life. {T}: Add {R} or {W}.

card.name: Wingmate Roc
card.text: Flying Raid — When Wingmate Roc enters the battlefield, if you attacked with a creature this turn, create a 3/4 white Bird creature token with flying. Whenever Wingmate Roc attacks, you gain 1 life for each attacking creature.

card.name: Woodland Stream
card.text: Woodland Stream enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {G} or {U}.

card.name: Yavimaya Coast
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Add {G} or {U}. Yavimaya Coast deals 1 damage to you.

card.name: Zetalpa, Primal Dawn
card.text: Flying, double strike, vigilance, trample, indestructible

card.name: Zombie Infestation
card.text: Discard two cards: Create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token.
